password.min: Password is too short - should be 6 chars minimum.
password.uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase character.
password.lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase character.
password.digit: Must contain at least one number.
password.special: Your password must contain at least one of the following special characters: ^ $ * . [ ] { } ( ) ? - " ! @ # % & / \ , > < \' : ; | _ ~ `
